Organics:
 
"I heard a distress call, and answere it.  Me and Ydrassil.  We have two new guests.  This is Fortuneteller, and that is my older step brother, Megatron." the valkyrie said, pointing to th newest arrivals.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Windlord:

Windlord loeft the base a flew around when he saw Organics and other 
bots there.

He landed and said.

"Organics??? what are you doing here"said kindly the male


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> OOC:  Malice is currently inside Unicron.  Two of the Minions have 
successfully brainwashed him... I think.  A tricky one, Malice.  
There is a femme currently inside the base, named Wolfblade, who has 
great feelings for him.  But her player has disappeared right now.  
Malice is sparing against the minion Blacknightmare right now.
>  
> Megatron Revived/ Organics:
>  
> Megatron Revived kneeled down to see what exactly Fortuneteller 
was doing.  He tried scanning fo unusual energies, but came up with 
nothing.
> "How does this work, I have seen many things many spiritual 
ceremonies, but never something like this."
>  
> Organics leaned over Fortuneteller to see what she is doing.  She 
kept her questions to herself.  
> 
> Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> 
> "We shall see," she said, she whispered the question
> to her bolts and thew them down on the ground in front
> of the bot. "Their pattern will tell all...hmmm...I
> see you have a great power, it is the shadow of the
> light that was your undoing...oh, and yes, I believe I
> see something about Malice, but it's vague, allow me a
> moment."
> 
> OOC: Sorry, I thought I sent it to the group. Anyway,
> how is Malice?
> 
> --- "The Ultimate Archfiend of Darkness, Devouring"
> wrote:
> > Megatron Revived:
> > 
> > "Then... Do you know if Malice is okay? Tell me,
> > will Malice return 
> > to us?" the clone demanded.
> > 
> > 
> > OOC: Fortuneteller's player sent this to me instead
> > of the group. 
> > So here it is. 
> > 
> > Fortuneteller:
> > 
> > "I believe I may be able to asist you in your
> > battle against Unicron," said Fortuneteller, "we
> > Gypsyions have some ability to forsee what will be."
> > 
> > She knew she couldn't reveal the full extent of her
> > power, but she COULD use it to gain their
> > trust...and
> > then backstab them.
> 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley
> > 
> > wrote:
> > > OOC: Don't count Malice out yet. Right now he is
> > under Unicron's 
> > influance, capable of anything. Look to Ydrassil,
> > Windlord, perhaps 
> > Hydras or some other Pred.
> 
> 
>
